actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spawn makes one bite attack and two sting attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1d6 rounds.

special_abilities.name: Command Vermin
special_abilities.desc: Spawn of Akyishigal can command tiny beasts of Intelligence 2 or less within 30 feet that aren't under any magical control. The vermin obey the spawn's commands to the best of their ability, heedless of their own safety.

special_abilities.name: Swarming Cough (recharge 5-6)
special_abilities.desc: The spawn can belch forth a swarm of insects. The swarm is completely under the spawn's control. It remains for 1 minute or until destroyed.
